decisions.decision: Renamed adr-review 'Debate Protocol' heading to 'Process' for validator compliance
decisions.rationale: Validator regex checks for ## Process or ### Phase N headings; Debate Protocol did not match

decisions.rationale: 83% of skills never activated; passive context improves discovery without requiring skill invocation
